adjectives.description: avoidable (comparative more avoidable, superlative most avoidable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being vacated; liable to be annulled or made invalid; voidable.
Capable of being avoided, shunned, or escaped.
examples: The minister confessed that many of the deaths were avoidable.

entries.meaning: Something that can or should be avoided.
examples: Though Mrs Golson re-appeared regularly at the Twyborns', she was on my list of avoidables from the night of the corked moustache until she sprang upon us yesterday.
